Helper: Build tidy HP (Harvest / ProbZeroHarvest) 50-yr summaries with quantiles

Source: R/make_Kusko_figure_E.R
dot-make_50yr_hp_tidy.Rd

Harvest stats are read from summary_list$harvest (output of .summarize_50_year_avg()). Probability of zero harvest (P0) is computed directly from data$results$obs by:

  1. Identifying the common last-50-year window across iterations (same rule as .summarize_by_year()): the minimum available length across all iterations and scenarios, capped at 50.

  2. For each scenario and iteration, computing the 50-yr mean of the zero-harvest indicator: as.numeric(obsHarv <= 0).

  3. Across iterations, summarizing to mean and quantiles (10, 25, 50, 75, 90\

Usage

.make_50yr_hp_tidy(data, summary_list, scen_df, statistic = "mean")

Arguments

data

ssi_run object (from run_scenarios()).

summary_list

Output from .summarize_50_year_avg(data).

scen_df

Scenario metadata tibble with standardized labels and column scen matching the order of scenarios (e.g., "scenario_1", ...).

statistic

Point estimate for harvest axis: "mean" or "median".

Value

Tidy data.frame (one row per scenario) with columns: mgmt, selectivity, trends, factorMSY, scen, harv_mean, harv_q10, harv_q25, harv_q50, harv_q75, harv_q90, p0_mean, p0_q10, p0_q25, p0_q50, p0_q75, p0_q90
